article.title: Lockheed Martin Receives Contract For Four C-130J Super Hercules Aircraft For Qatar
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation and the State of Qatar have signed a $393.6 million contract for the purchase of four C-130J Super Hercules airlifters plus training and spares. The package includes four aircraft, training of aircrew and maintenance technicians, spares, ground support and test equipment, and a team of technical specialists who will be based in Qatar during an initial support period.
